description: Celebrate Spanish flavours with this tender slow-cooker beef stew. Slow cooking brings out the sweetness of the capsicum, tomato and onion.
name: Slow-cooker Spanish-style beef stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g Woolworths beef chuck, cut into 3cm cubes
1 small red capsicum, halved, deseeded, cut into 1.5cm strips
1 small red onion, cut into thin wedges
1 cup drained pitted green olives, halved
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-hight heat. Cook beef, in 2 batches, for 5 minutes, turning, or until browned all over. Transfer to the bowl of a 5.5-litre slow cooker*. Add flour and paprika to frying pan. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until bubbling. Add tomato, stock, garlic and vinegar. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until mixture begins to bubble. Transfer to slow cooker and add chorizo, capsicum, onion and potato. Season with pepper. Stir to combine.
Cover and cook on low for 6 hours (or on high for 3 hours) or until beef is tender. Stir in olives. Divide beef mixture among bowls and sprinkle with parsley. Season with pepper and serve.
